thread.title: Kelly Ripa Says Mark Consuelos Is 'Mean' to Her After Sex: 'I Think It's Bizarre'
thread.title_full: Kelly Ripa Says Mark Consuelos Is 'Mean' to Her After Sex: 'I Think It's Bizarre'

author: Latifah Muhammad
title: Kelly Ripa Says Mark Consuelos Is 'Mean' to Her After Sex: 'I Think It's Bizarre'
text: Kelly Ripa Says Mark Consuelos Is 'Mean' to Her After Sex: 'I Think It's Bizarre' by Latifah Muhammad 4:12 PM   Photo: Getty Images Kelly Ripa doesn't mind getting candid with her Live! audience. On Wednesday's show, the 46-year-old host revealed that husband Marc Consuelos, who was co-hosting with her, is "mean" after making love. RELATED:: Kelly Ripa Calls Anderson Cooper Her 'Man Crush Monday' as He Returns to Co-Host 'Live!' But just in case children were watching, Ripa made sure to refer to her sex life as "special grownup time." "He's immediately mean to me afterwards and I don't like that," she shared as a smiling Consuelos sat next to her. "I think it's bizarre. He becomes short with me, like irritated." "I'm like, 'Oh, now you're irritated?'" Ripa jokingly continued. "You were so loving three minutes ago!" Consuelos, 45, took the lighthearted moment in stride, laughing with his wife as she playfully assured the actor that she was joking. Partially, at least. Despite the hilarious bedroom admission, Ripa and her handsome hubby are still very much in love. On Monday, Ripa tweeted out a snapshot of Consuelos with the "Mancrush Monday" hashtag and fire emojis. — Kelly Ripa (@KellyRipa) February 7, 2017 Meanwhile, Consuelos tends to gush about Ripa with cutesy Instagram posts, calling her his "fave." A photo posted by Mark Consuelos. (@instasuelos) on Feb 8, 2017 at 5:33am PST A photo posted by Mark Consuelos. (@instasuelos) on Jan 19, 2017 at 4:34pm PST A photo posted by Mark Consuelos. (@instasuelos) on Jan 16, 2017 at 6:01am PST A photo posted by Mark Consuelos. (@instasuelos) on Dec 31, 2016 at 8:54pm PST
